sentences.en: At the funfair, near the ghost train , the marshmallow twister is twisting.
sentences.cn: 游艺集市上,就在幽灵车旁边, 果浆软糖搅拌机正在搅拌.

sentences.en: Father took us to the funfair last weekend.
sentences.cn: 爸爸上周末带我们到游乐场去了.

sentences.en: One of the most poignant sights awaiting visitors is the funfair, which was due to open just a few days before disaster struck.
sentences.cn: 最能打动游客心弦的情景是一家游乐场，它原定几天后就要开放。

sentences.en: So Mrand Mrs. White took their children to the funfair Mr.
sentences.cn: 因此,怀特夫妇带着他们的孩子们去了游乐场.

sentences.en: The children have a whale of a time at the funfair.
sentences.cn: 孩子们在游乐场玩得很高兴.

sentences.en: They had a whale of a time at the funfair.
sentences.cn: 他们在游乐场玩得很开心.

sentences.en: We really enjoyed ourselves at th funfair.
sentences.cn: 379我们在娱乐场确实玩得很开心.

trans.tran_en: a noisy outdoor event where you can ride on machines, play games to win prizes etc
